page.title: 09SPORT IN ULEY
page.content: Uley Sports field provides facilities for a wide range of sporting activities all the year round. The village teams enjoy considerable success at variious levels and enjoy too the benefit of enthusiastic supporters. Football and cricket clubs encourage the formation of junior teams which are,inturn, fed from local Junior and Secondary schools. Uley Ladies football team,a relatively new formation, also enjoy a good deal of success and support but their fixture list is not full because of the shortage of opposition within a reasonable travelling distance. Tennis and horse riding are popular sports in the area, while gliders operate from a nearby Glider Club. Hang-gliding is also popular.
